subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Drug Abuse and Traffic
organizations: State University of New York at Binghamton
lead_paragraph: A statement signed by 18 faculty members recommended a vote on whether Binghamton should remain in Division I after a scandal surrounding the men’s basketball team.
snippet: A statement signed by 18 faculty members recommended a vote on whether Binghamton should remain in Division I after a scandal surrounding the men’s basketball team.
